availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Elijah K. Howard (Madison County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace)

body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Roberts Howard in Madison County, Kentucky, on January 1847. Father of Angeline Howard, Napoleon B. Howard, Marion J. Howard, Lafayette Howard, and Elijah K. Howard. Farmer in Madison County in 1850. Farmer in Madison County in 1860. Magistrate in Madison County. Justice of the peace in Madison County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, District 2, p. 278A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, Western Subdivision, p. 195-196.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Madison County Marriages, Film #000183314.
